name: Pickle and Peanut
summary:
Pickle and Peanut is an American animated television series that premiered on Disney XD on September 7, 2015.  The series was created by Noah Z. Jones, creator of Fish Hooks and Almost Naked Animals, and developed by Joel Trussell. It is about two anthropomorphic friends, Pickle and Peanut, whose misadventures form the content of the show. As with Jones' previous Disney series Fish Hooks, the show utilises a combination of live action and animation elements.

On July 23, 2016, during the San Diego Comic Con 2016, Disney announced that the show has been renewed for a second season.
